## Fix seed

::: {.cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import torch
torch.manual_seed(2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=1}
```
<torch._C.Generator at 0x12b6ca230>
```
:::
:::


::: {.cell execution_count=2}
``` {.python .cell-code}
torch.manual_seed(2)
print(torch.randn(5))
print(torch.randn(5))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
tensor([ 0.3923, -0.2236, -0.3195, -1.2050,  1.0445])
tensor([-0.6332,  0.5731,  0.5409, -0.3919, -1.0427])
```
:::
:::
